scripts.dev: npm run kill-servers && npm run clear-cache && vite --port 3886 --host 127.0.0.1 --force
scripts.dev-clean: npm run kill-servers && npm run clear-cache && vite --port 3886 --host 127.0.0.1 --force
scripts.clear-cache: rimraf node_modules/.vite && rimraf dist && echo Cache cleared
scripts.check:hover-translate: rg -n "hover[^\{]*\{[\s\S]*?transform:.*translate" css styles || echo 'No :hover translate violations found'
scripts.check:filters: rg -n "document\.body\.style\.filter" js || echo 'No direct body filter writes found'
scripts.check:guardrails: npm run -s check:hover-translate && npm run -s check:filters
scripts.budget:report: npm run check:budgets && echo Budget reports available in artifacts/budgets/
scripts.baseline:analyze: npm run baseline && node scripts/analyze-baseline.js artifacts/baseline/perf-$(date +%Y%m%d-*)*.jsonl || echo 'Run baseline first'
